shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” (fols. 3ra-121va) I-1) ʾƎsäggǝd lä-mäläkotǝkä... “I worship Thy Godhead…” (fols. 3ra-4va) I-2) Introduction (fols. 5ra-11rb) - On John the Evangelist as the author of the book; on the creation and the fall of the angels (fols. 5ra-7vb) - Story of the family of Adam (fols. 8ra-11rb) I-3) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus”: 66 miracles (fols. 11rb-117ra) I-4) Correspondence between King Abgar and Jesus; the story of the martyrs of Akmim (fols. 117ra-121va) (ed. S. GRÉBAUT, “Les relations entre Abgar et Jésus”, ROC 21, 1918-19, 73-87; “La mort des martyrs d'Akmim“, ibid. 92-93).

donors.donor: Zä-Wäldä Maryam, Zärʾa Ṣǝyon, Ḫadära Mikaʾel, ʾAmḫa Giyorgis and Lǝʿulä Qal are mentioned in the supplication formulas.

txstates.txstate: Part of the leather cover on both boards and the spine is torn off. The spine has been crudely covered with a piece of recent blue textile fastened by means of synthetic threads. Many fols. are stained with water, wax and dirt. Fols. 1-2, 121-122 and the upper turn-ins are damaged by rodents. Holes are carefully amended on fols. 33, 58, 59.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: double line fillet, double circle, corni form, interlaced line fillet, x-form, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of some quires, close to the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(2: s.l.: 1, stub after 1; 2, stub before 1/fols.1r-2v) – I(2/fols. 3r-4v) – II፩(7; s.l.: 3, stub after 5/fols. 5r-11v) – ፪III፪(7; s.l.: 5, stub after 4/fols. 12r-18v) – ፫IV፫(7; s.l.: 5, stub after 2/fols. 19r-25v) – ፬V፬(7; s.l.: 3, stub after 5/fols. 26r-32v) –፭VI፭ (6/fols. 33r-38v) – ፮VII፮(9; s.l.: 2, stub after 8/fols. 39r-47v) – ፯VIII፯(7; s.l.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 48r-54v) – ፰IX፰(7; s.l.: 6, stub after 1/fols. 55r-61v) – ፱X፱(8/fols. 62r-69v) – ፲XI፲(7; s.l.: 2, stub after 6/fols. 70r-76v) – ፲፩XII፲፩(9; s.l.: 4, stub after 6/fols. 77r-85v) – ፲፪XIII፲፪(7; s.l.: 3, stub after 5/fols. 86r-92v) – ፲፫XIV፲፫(8/fols. 93r-100v) – ፲፬XV፲፬(8/fols. 101r-108v) – ፲፭XVI፲፭(8/fols. 109r-116v) – XVII(6/fols. 117r-122v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipit of Texts I-1, I-4; incipit of sections of Text I-2; numbers and incipits of miracles; word ʾǝsäggǝd in Text I-1; elements of the punctuation signs; Ethiopic numerals and/or their elements. A few groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I-2.

otherdetails.otherdetail: The miracles are introduced with the words mǝʿǝraf “chapter”, täʾamǝr “miracle”, täʾamrihu “his miracle”, nägär “speech”. They are counted starting from number 6 (fol. 14vb).

extras.extra: - The title ተአምረ፡ ኢየሱስ is written on the back board, in red felt-tip pen. - Omitted letters, words, lines or passages written interlineally and in the margins, in the main hand: e.g., fols. 5rb, 13va, 14ra, 15vb, 20ra, 36va, 38vb, 42vb, 44rb, 48va, 57rb, 57vb, 63vb, 65rb, 74rb, 77rb, 93vb, 94rb, 97rab, 98vb, 99ra, 118ra. - Corrections written over erasures, in the main hand: fols. 7ra, 34ra, 36ra. - Erasures marked with thin lines: fols. 10vb, 11rb, 11vb, 15ra, 40va, 44rb, 45vb, 46vb, 48rb, 50va, 52rb, 82ra. - Erasures: 17ra, 23vb, 31ra. - Scribbles: 2r, 4r, 5r, 6rb, 68va, 122r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper corner of the first fol. of the quire and in the right upper corner of the last fol. of the quire: fols. 5r, 12r, 18v, 19r, 25v, 26r, 32v, 33r, 38v, 39r, 47v, 48r, 54v, 55r, 61v, 62r, 69v, 70r, 76v, 77r, 85v, 86r, 92v, 93r, 100v, 101r, 108, 109r, 116v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Titles of miracles or feasts indicating respective readings are written in the upper margin, in the main hand: ዘ[በዓለ]፡ መላእክት: fol. 5ra ዘአቡነ፡ አዳም: fol. 8ra ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 10rb ዘእግዝእትነ: fol. 11rb ልደት: fol. 13rb ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 14vb ዘበዓለ፡ ስምዖን፡ fol. 19rb ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 28rb ዝኒ፡ ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 30vb ዘ፬: እንስሳ: fol. 32vb ዘኒቆዲሞስ: fol. 49rb ዘሐዋርያት: ወዘኵሎሙ: ሰማዕታት: fol. 51vb ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ fol. 54rb ዘጥምቀት: fol. 56va ዝኒ፡ ዘጥምቀት: fol. 58rb በቃና፡ ዘገሊላ: fol. 60rb - Names of feasts indicating respective readings are written in the margins or interlineally, in a secondary hand: ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 83vb ዘ፮ሰዓት: fol. 95ra ዘተ፱ሰዓት: fol. 95v ዘሠርክ፡ fol. 97va ዘሐዋርያት: fol. 114ra - Fols. 3r-22r have been recently foliated with Ethiopic numbers crudely written in the right upper corner, in pen.
